title: Brooklyn Beckham, 20, is 'dating actress Phoebe Torrance, 25, after Hana Cross split'
text:
He and his model girlfriend Hana Cross called quits on their romance over the summer.

And now Brooklyn Beckham is reportedly dating actress Phoebe Torrance, who is five years his senior.

The aspiring photographer, 20, is said to have enjoyed a string of dates with the stunning brunette, 25, who is believed to have worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike in the past.

Dating: Brooklyn Beckham is reportedly dating actress Phoebe Torrance, who is five years his senior following his Hana Cross split (pictured in 2018)

According to reports, Brooklyn has been 'teased by his friends' over how similar Phoebe and his famous mother look.

A source told The Sun: 'Bizarrely though, from a certain angle she does look terrifyingly like his mother, Victoria.

'A few of his friends have teased him about it but Brooklyn is adamant that there is nothing 'Oedipal' about it - or words to that effect.

'But Phoebe told pals that she actually did a few jobs as a Victoria lookalike in her early modelling days, the money of which helped fund her university course. Presumably she never thought she might one day meet her idol.'

Stunning: The aspiring photographer, 20, is said to have enjoyed a string of dates with the stunning brunette, 25, who is believed to have worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike in the past (pictured)

MailOnline has contacted Brooklyn's representative for comment.

Phoebe's Instagram page shows her glowing good looks, with her posing in a variety of racy shots.

The star is thought to be popular with Brooklyn's family and even follows his little brother Romeo, 17, on Instagram.

Claims: According to reports, Brooklyn has been 'teased by his friends' over how similar Phoebe, pictured left, and his famous mother, pictured right, look

Phoebe is the daughter of former professional golfer Sam Torrance.

She has starred as Amber Ross in horror Mandy the Doll and in boxing drama Six Rounds.

The starlet also featured in a single episode of Friday Night Dinner as Mandy The Waitress.

Stunning: Phoebe's Instagram page shows her glowing good looks, with her posing in a variety of racy shots

The news comes following Brooklyn's split with model Hanna in the summer.

The pair were together for nine months but had had several high profile arguments before their split.

Last month they risked an awkward run-in when they both showed up at the same exclusive event in London.

Moving on: The news comes following Brooklyn's split with model Hanna Cross in the summer, they were together for nine months (pictured in February)

Brooklyn was seen making his way into the LOVE & YouTube Fashion Week party, held at The Standard, within minutes of Hana's arrival.

Their night out at the same soirée came amid reports that Brooklyn kissed another of his exes, Lexy Panterra, while partying in the English capital.

It was also recently reported that Hana was left in tears by ex Brooklyn, after the pair faced an awkward run-in at the Agent Provocateur AW19 campaign launch party.

A source told The Sun that she was consoled by her friends following the tense encounter, and was later seen leaving the party five minutes after Brooklyn.

The source said: 'They were chatting together and it was very tense. By the end of it I could hear Brooklyn say, '"it is what it is."

'He walked off and she went back to her friends looking dejected, but she held it together while her pals comforted her.'

MailOnline contacted representatives for Brooklyn and Hana at the time.
description: The aspiring photographer, 20, is said to have enjoyed a string of dates with the stunning brunette, 25, who is believed to have worked as his mum Victoria's lookalike in the past.
